HOME.TITLE: Motivational Quotes
HOME.TEXT1: Well, we are living in times, where there is literally stress around every corner. Even with the best efforts, stress cannot be avoided, so we all seek new and innovative ways of escape, or to simply handle this pressure.
HOME.TEXT2: Smiles are contagious and quotes can often bring a huge, sparkling smile to your face. There are lots of quotes to inspire you out there while new ones are being generated on a daily basis.
